title: France panorama. [No. 71/05]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Sport - rugby union - France vs Scotland. 2. Professional training - Metal Industry and Association of Training and Perfecting of Industrial Personnel has opened its 6th Youth and Adult Training center in the Paris region, where young men are taught metalcraft. 3. Science in the service of mankind - French scientists have just invented the world’s first nuclear cardiac pacemaker. 4. The arts - the country’s most ancient museum founded in 1694 on a donation from a Benedictine Convent, has recently been renovated - interior arrangement by Luis Michel. It houses an extensive art collection including the George and Adele Besson collection which includes work by Picasso, Desnoyer, Lohte and Matisse.
